vehicle.look.image.description: This value provides an image of the vehicle as a PNG file.

vehicle.sim.status.cardata_element: Activation status of the installed SIM card
vehicle.sim.status.description: This value indicates whether the SIM card installed in the vehicle is activated.

vehicle.extras.optionalEquipment.code.description: This value indicates a list with information about the optional equipment of the vehicle.
vehicle.extras.optionalEquipment.code.typical_value_range: 4-digit number and/or letter code comma-separated from each other.

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.bat.description: This value indicates the size of the installed high-voltage battery.

vehicle.vehicleIdentification.basicVehic.description: This value indicates a list of basic vehicle data, e.g. vehicle brand and full model name.
vehicle.vehicleIdentification.basicVehic.typical_value_range: Details can be found in the corresponding Swagger documentation: ../basicData

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.hvsMax.cardata_element: Maximum energy content of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.hvsMax.description: This value indicates the maximum available energy content of the high-voltage battery.

vehicle.body.lights.isRunningOn.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle light was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.isMobilePhone.description: This value indicates whether a mobile phone was linked to the vehicle at the time of data collection or whether the connection status is unknown.

vehicle.isMoving.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was in motion at the time of data collection.

vehicle.channel.ngtp.timeVehicle.description: These values indicate the time shown in the vehicle at the time of recording the data.

vehicle.cabin.window.row1.driver.status.description: This value indicates whether the front left window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.window.row2.driver.status.description: This value indicates whether the rear left window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.window.row1.passenger.stat.description: This value indicates whether the front right window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.status.serviceTime.yellow.description: The static value indicated is stored in the vehicle and indicates the first time that the customer receives a message to inform them that the vehicle will soon be due for a service. This is given in weeks (for example 4).

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.activity.cardata_element: Pre-conditioning status of the stationary air conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.activity.description: Current status of the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning before commencing travel at the time of data collection. The value “Inactive” may be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning is not active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.cardata_element: Reason for not carrying out pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.description: Reason for not carrying out pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.typical_value_range: LowFuel, LowBattery, QuotaExceeded, HeaterFailure, ComponentFailure, OpenOrUnlocked, OK, INVALID

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.description: This value indicates the distance to the active navigation destination in kilometres or miles at the time of data collection. The values range from 0 km to 100000 km or from 0mi to 62137mi.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.typical_value_range: 0 km to 100000 km or 0 mi to 62137 mi

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.re.description: This value indicates the remaining range of fuel in kilometres or miles at the time of data collection.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.re.typical_value_range: 0 km to 100000 km or 0 mi to 62137 mi

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.cardata_element: Permission to use the engine for pre-conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.description: This value indicated whether permission was granted to use the engine for the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection. This is determined by the customer.

This value indicates whether the engine was active during pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection. The value “Inactive” may be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning is not active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.status.serviceDistance.next.description: This value indicates how many kilometres or miles remain before the next service at the time of recording the data. Note: This value is calculated based on the individual CBS scopes and is not determined with every data transfer. For more details, see "Condition Based Service".
vehicle.status.serviceDistance.next.typical_value_range: 0 km to 100,000 km or 0 mi to 62,137 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.remainingF.description: The value indicates the current fuel tank level in litres or gallons at the time of data collection. Depending on the position of the tank float, the specified value may differ by up to 6 litres or 1.6 gallons.
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.remainingF.typical_value_range: 0 L to 100 L or 0 gal to 26.5 gal

vehicle.channel.teleservice.status.description: This value indicates whether teleservices are available for this vehicle.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.status.description: This value indicates whether the sunroof (if the vehicle has one) was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.tiltStatus.description: This value indicates whether the sunroof (if the vehicle has one) was tilted (OPEN), half-tilted (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.body.trunk.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the boot lid was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.door.status.description: This value indicates the status of the doors, but is only sporadically recorded and transmitted. Note: It is recommended to use only the individual door status instead of this value.
vehicle.cabin.door.status.typical_value_range: oldDoorStatus: ASN_secured ASN_unlocked ASN_unknown ASN_selective-Locked newDoorStatus: ASN_locked ASN_unlocked ASN_selective-Locked ASN_unknown allDoorsLocked: ASN_isUnknown ASN_isTrue ASN_isFalse trunkLocked: ASN_isUnknown ASN_isTrue ASN_isFalse

vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isActive.description: This value indicates whether the ignition was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.remainin.description: This value indicates the remaining duration for the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning in minutes at the time of data collection. This value may also be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning status of the stationary air conditioning is not active (“inactive”) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.electronicControlUnit.diagnostic.description: The fault memory provides information about potential errors or technical faults in the vehicle. This information is intended for workshops. Customer-relevant errors that are displayed to the driver in the vehicle can be found under the CarData Element “Check control messages”. Details about this are documented in the operating manual of the vehicle.
vehicle.electronicControlUnit.diagnostic.typical_value_range: The JSON structure is appended at the end of the table (4).

vehicle.body.trunk.window.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear window is unlocked (TRUE) or closed (FALSE).

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.displayUnit.d.cardata_element: Display unit of instrument panel in vehicle
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.displayUnit.d.description: This value indicates the units (kilometres or miles) in which distances are indicated on the vehicle instrument panel.

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the front left door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the front right door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear right door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: This value indicates the degree of latitude at which the vehicle was at the time of data collection. The degree of latitude could range from 0 (at the equator) to a maximum of +90 in the northern hemisphere or respectively -90 in the southern hemisphere. The GPS position is transferred independently of whether the GPS positioning has been activated or deactivated in your vehicle via the settings menu.

This value indicates the degree of longitude at which the vehicle was at the time of data collection. The degree of longitude could range from 0 (at the Greenwich meridian / Great Britain) to a maximum of +180 east or respectively -180 west of the meridian. The GPS position is transferred independently of whether the GPS positioning has been activated or deactivated in your vehicle via the settings menu.

This value indicates the orientation of the vehicle in degrees at the time of data collection. If the value is 180, the vehicle is pointing directly south. If the value is 0, the vehicle is pointing directly north. The values thus range from 0 to 359. The determined orientation of the vehicle may differ from its actual orientation due to inaccuracies in the GPS positioning.

vehicle.body.hood.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle's hood was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.status.serviceTime.inspectionDat.description: This value indicates when the next inspection is due. A date will be shown respectively, for example 30.09.2018 23:00 UTC or 09.30.2018 23:00 UTC.
vehicle.status.serviceTime.inspectionDat.typical_value_range: dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm UTC or mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm UTC

vehicle.vehicle.timeSetting.cardata_element: Time zone setting in the vehicle
vehicle.vehicle.timeSetting.description: This value indicates the current setting for the time display in the vehicle at the time of data collection. For example, this may be winter time, summer time, UTC or manual.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: This value indicates the height of the vehicle above sea-level at the time of data collection. The value range reaches from -100m to 6000m or from -328ft to 19685ft.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.typical_value_range: -100 m to 6000 m or -328 ft to 19685 ft or -NA-

vehicle.status.conditionBasedServicesCou.description: The value specifies the maximum number of service notifications transmitted from the vehicle to BMW via telematics. The actual number of service notifications transmitted (see separate CBS key) varies depending on how the vehicle is used and whether relevant thresholds have been reached. Note: Not all Condition Based service messages which occur in the vehicle are also transferred.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.cardata_element: Number of free POI spaces in navigation system
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.description: This value indicates how many POIs (points of interest) are still open in the navigation system.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.cardata_element: Maximum number of POIs stored in the navigation system
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.description: This value indicates how many POIs (points of interest) can be stored in the navigation system.

vehicle.vehicle.travelledDistance.description: The value indicates the current mileage at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.travelledDistance.typical_value_range: 0 km to 500000 km or 0 mi to 310686 mi

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.description: This value indicates the arrival time at the navigation destination and is given in hours and minutes.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.shade.position.description: Item position. 0 = Start position 100 = End position.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.co.description: Third row passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: The charging profile provides information about the charging mode most recently selected for your vehicle. Where appropriate, CarData element may also be used to display individual attributes in cars without an electric drive, e.g. the preconditioning settings.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: The XML structure is appended at the end of the table (1).

vehicle.status.serviceTime.hUandAuServic.cardata_element: Time threshold for main and exhaust gas inspection
vehicle.status.serviceTime.hUandAuServic.description: The threshold indicates how many months before the main and exhaust gas inspection is due the service advisor will be notified.

vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofStatus.description: Indicates the current status of the convertible roof at the time of data collection, e.g. whether it was closed (CLOSED), open (OPEN) or – in an emergency – locked (EMERGENCYLOCKED). The following additional status values are possible: CLOSEDSECURED = convertible roof closed, vehicle secured OPENSECURED = convertible roof open, vehicle secured HARDTOPMOUNTED = hard top mounted and closed (removable hard top) INTERMEDIATEPOSITION = convertible roof in intermediate position LOADINGPOSITION = roof is in a position that allows for easy loading of the boot LOADINGPOSITIONIMMEDIATE = roof is in a position that allows for easy loading of the boot

vehicle.drivetrain.internalCombustionEng.description: The value indicates the current coolant temperature in degrees centigrade or Fahrenheit at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.description: This value indicates the coordinate of the active navigation destination – latitude at the time of data collection in billionths of a second.
This value indicates the coordinate of the active navigation destination – longitude at the time of data collection in billionths of a second.

vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isIgnitionOn.description: This value indicates whether the engine was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.
Default settings for rear driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for third row passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.overallStatus.description: Overall status of the vehicle's sunroof.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.level.description: This value indicates the tank level in percent at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: True if remote engine start option is set, otherwise false.
Default settings for rear passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.cardata_element: Default third row driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for target temperature for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.statusAirPurification.description: Actual status of the air purification.

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastBreakdow.description: Auto break down. The Breakdown Call allows the customer to contact a Roadside Assistance Call Center (RSA CC) Agent in case of a breakdown, which will assist the driver with troubleshooting or towing of the vehicle. The Breakdown Call allows the customer to contact a Roadside Assistance Call Center (RSA CC) Agent in case of a breakdown, which will assist the driver with troubleshooting or towing of the vehicle. The service can be started from the iDrive menu of the vehicle and is available in 3 Levels depending on availability and roll-out in the market.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.cardata_element: Default third row driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Status of the comfort state of the climate preconditioning.
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.typical_value_range: NOT_ACTIVE, COMFORT_HEATING, COMFORT_COOLING, COMFORT_VENTILATION, DEFROST, COMFORT_UNDEFINED

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.cooli.description: Rear driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.heati.description: Rear driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastManualCa.description: Customer triggers a manual service call via the vehicle HMI (iDrive). Service relevant data is transferred by the vehicle to the Teleservices backend systemA new Teleservice ticket is created and assigned to customer's preferred service partner.The Teleservice ticket is transferred to the service partner system to process it according to the respective business process

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.voltage.description: The value indicates the current battery voltage in the vehicle's electrical system. This value is always given in voltage, e.g. 14.4 V.

vehicle.sevice.preferredSevicePartner.description: Indicates the current service partner allocation of the vehicle.

vehicle.serviceDemand.defect.id.description: This value indicates which service requirements have been determined for the vehicle based on the live diagnostics. These are composed of the title, category and current status of the required service. The vehicle collects error data for the service requirements, and automatically sends them according to defined cycles.

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.service.description: This value indicates the health status of the battery. 200 = Adequate health status of the battery 140 = Limited – Battery replacement recommended 110 = Inadequate – Battery replacement required 80 = Degraded – Battery replacement urgently required

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.service.cardata_element: Necessity for recharging of the battery
vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.service.description: This value indicates whether recharging of the battery is necessary. 1 = Recharging necessary 0 = Recharging not necessary

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.cardata_element: Default third row passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Current status of the exterior mirror heating.
Progress of the currently active climate preconditioning in percent.

vehicle.cabin.door.lock.status.description: This indicates whether the vehicle's doors were locked (LOCKED) or unlocked (UNLOCKED) at the time of data collection. Other possible values are: SELECTIVELOCKED = vehicle locked with the exception of the left front door (state after a remote service door unlock was first performed) SECURED = vehicle has been secured = all doors locked and alarm system activated
vehicle.cabin.door.lock.status.typical_value_range: SECURED, UNLOCKED, SELECTIVE-LOCKED, LOCKED, INVALID, UNKNOWN

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.stateOf.description: The value indicates the state of charge of the low-voltage battery in percent measured at the time of data collection.
This value indicates whether the measured state of charge of the low-voltage battery in percent is plausible.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for steering wheel heating for climate preconditioning.
Default settings for target temperature for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for front driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Current status of the rear window heating.

vehicle.status.serviceDistance.yellow.description: The static value indicated is stored in the vehicle and indicates the first time that the customer receives a mileage-related message to inform him that the vehicle will soon be due for a service. It is given in kilometres or miles (for example 2000 km or 1243 mi).

vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofRetractabl.description: Convertible Roof Retractable State. BMW Mini vehicles have the additionally option to only open the folding roof. This signal represents the Mini folding roof state. It should be read together with the convertible roof state as well, see Vehicle.Cabin.Convertible.RoofStatus.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Remaining runtime of climate preconditioning in seconds.

vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.description: Timestamp of the last alarm activation time. The value comes without timezone information.

vehicle.vehicle.deepSleepModeActive.description: This value indicates whether Deep Sleep Mode is activated (“true”) or deactivated (“false”) at the time of the request. If the customer has activated Deep Sleep Mode, the vehicle can be parked for a longer time without charging the battery. In this mode, most consumers are deactivated to save energy. The customer can end Deep Sleep Mode by deactivating it or starting the vehicle.

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.position.description: Driver-side front door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.he.description: Front passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear left door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.positi.description: Passenger-side front door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.cooli.description: Front driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.heati.description: Front driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.co.description: Front passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.position.description: Driver-side rear door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for rear driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for third row passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.co.description: Rear passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.channel.ista.obfcm.lastTransmiss.cardata_element: Status information about the last transfer of OBFCM* values
vehicle.channel.ista.obfcm.lastTransmiss.description: This value indicates the status information about the last transfer of OBFCM* values performed in a workshop (i.e. wired). (OK for a valid transfer where the OBFCM values have been updated, ECU_COMMUNICATION_ERROR for errors in collecting data from the control units, VEHICLE_MANIPULATION_DETECTED if vehicle tampering has been detected and MANUFACTURER_EXCLUDED if the vehicle manufacturer is excluded from the OBFCM* collection (e.g. Alpina, Toyota Supra).

vehicle.body.trunk.isLocked.description: Indicated weather the trunk is locked or not.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.positi.description: Passenger-side rear door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.he.description: Rear passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.window.row2.passenger.stat.description: This value indicates whether the rear right window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.description: Anti theft alarm is active (car is honking).

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.
Default settings for front passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for rear passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for steering wheel heating for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.cooli.description: Third row driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.he.description: Third row passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.chassis.axle.wheel.tire.diagnosi.description: This value contains information about the tyres currently and previously installed on the vehicle. This data is collected by the vehicle and automatically sent according to defined cycles.
vehicle.chassis.axle.wheel.tire.diagnosi.typical_value_range: Details can be found in the corresponding Swagger documentation: ../smartMaintenanceTyreDiagnosis

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.cardata_element: Default third row passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for third row driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.
DirectStart settings for third row driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.heati.description: Third row driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.steeringWheel.heating.description: Actual value of the steering wheel heating in percent.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.relativePosition.description: Openingt state of the sunroof in percent. -100 means full tilt position. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceLon.description: This value indicates the weekly average travelled in kilometres or miles over a period of 2 months.
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceLon.typical_value_range: 1 km to 3000 km or 1 mi to 1864 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.lastRemainingRange.description: Last sent remaining range electric + fuel sent by the vehicle. Range from vehicle Kombi (Queried for PHEV and CE vehicles). Delivers e-range + ce range for PHEV. Ce Range for CE vehicles. Likely 0 for BEV vehicles. This value should only be used for combustion cars. Electric cars should read Vehicle.Drivetrain.ElectricEngine.KombiRemainingElectricRange.

vehicle.status.conditionBasedServices.description: Sensors and special algorithms take into account the operating conditions of the vehicle. CBS uses this to determine the required service. The system hereby adapts the scope of the service to the individual usage profile.
vehicle.status.conditionBasedServices.typical_value_range: The Condition Based Service example is appended at the end of the table (3).

vehicle.status.checkControlMessages.description: The value indicates the last relevant Check Control messages that were displayed in the vehicle and transferred to BMW. Check control monitors functions in the vehicle and notifies the user when there is a fault in the monitored system. A check control message is displayed as a combination of indicator lights or warning lights and text messages on the dashboard, and on the head-up display, if applicable. Note: Not all Check Control messages that are displayed in the vehicle are transferred to BMW.
vehicle.status.checkControlMessages.typical_value_range: The Check Control example is appended at the end of the table (2).

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: Total fuel consumption according to legal OBFCM* specifications
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the amount of fuel consumed in litres, measured over the reference distance.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* total fuel consumption during operation when the battery is discharged (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the amount of fuel consumption when the combustion engine switches on even though the battery is not flat.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* reference distance during charging mode
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the distance travelled during charging mode, i.e. PHEV charges the high-voltage battery.

vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.upperBound.description: Upper bound of the speed range in km/h. The Range excludes the upper bound. Due to privacy reasons some functions are not allowed to transmit the current driving speed and should use the SpeedRange attribute.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* reference distance during electric mode and when the combustion engine is active (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the distance travelled during electric mode and when the combustion engine is active.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* reference distance during electric mode and when the combustion engine is inactive (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the distance travelled during electric mode and when the combustion engine is inactive.

vehicle.privacySettings.dataCollection.r.cardata_element: Consent to OBFCM* data transfer to the EU
vehicle.privacySettings.dataCollection.r.description: This value indicates whether the client has consented to the transfer of OBFCM* data to the European Commission.

vehicle.status.conditionBasedServicesAve.description: Condition Based Services. Estimation on the daily travelled distance of the vehicle but heavily tailored for the us in the Condition Based Services context.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* reference distance for measuring the fuel consumption
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value indicates the reference distance for measuring fuel consumption.

vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.lowerBound.description: Lower bound of the speed range in km/h. The Range includes the lower bound. Due to privacy reasons some functions are not allowed to transmit the current driving speed and should use the SpeedRange attribute.

vehicle.learningNavigation.description: Displays the learned navigation recommendations (preferred routes and destinations of the customer).
vehicle.learningNavigation.typical_value_range: Details can be found in the corresponding Swagger documentation: ../learningNavigation

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.cardata_element: OBFCM* total fuel consumption during charging mode (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.consumptio.description: This value describes the fuel consumed during charging mode, i.e. PHEV charges the high-voltage battery using the combustion engine.

vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceSho.description: This indicates the average volume of the distance travelled in kilometres or miles per week.
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceSho.typical_value_range: 1 km to 3000 km or 1 mi to 1864 mi

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastTeleserv.description: This value indicates at what time the teleservice report call was initiated by the vehicle. The vehicle collects measured values or error data for the teleservice report call, and automatically sends them according to defined cycles.

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastAutomati.description: This value indicates at what time an Automatic Service Call (ASC) was initiated by the vehicle.
vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastAutomati.typical_value_range: dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm UTC or mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm UTC

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value shows a list of charging processes performed on the vehicle, which were recorded in the course of the “Charging History” service.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.typical_value_range: Details can be found in the corresponding Swagger documentation: ../chargingHistory

vehicle.trip.segment.end.travelledDistan.description: This value indicates the total mileage after the last drive logged.
vehicle.trip.segment.end.travelledDistan.typical_value_range: 0 km to 999999 km or 0 mi to 621371 mi

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates whether charging is limited due to noise emissions.

vehicle.body.flap.isPermanentlyUnlocked.cardata_element: Locking status of the charging flap
vehicle.body.flap.isPermanentlyUnlocked.description: This value indicates whether the charging flap is locked independently of the central locking at the time of data collection.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.dcStatus.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was connected to a DC charging plug at the time of data collection (CONNECTED) or not (DISCONNECTED).

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates which “Smart Charging” option is being used to charge with.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: AC charging current limit and selection
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: The first value indicates whether the charging current used to charge the vehicle is limited. The second value describes the type of limit (reduced or minimum).
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: NOTCHOSEN, CHOSEN, INVALID; MAXCHARGING, REDUCEDCHARGING, MINCHARGING, INVALID

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.hea.description: This value indicates the current charging status of the vehicle at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates the set limit of the charging current in amperes (A).

vehicle.body.chargingPort.combinedStatus.description: Current condition for charging plug in all charging modes telling if any plug is currently connected. The value INVALID can have reasons like e.g. no sensor, broken sensor, no value, decoding errors etc. Combines Vehicle.Body.ChargingPort.Status/.DcStatus.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates whether a charging current limit was active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Charging process of the high-voltage battery (phases)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the number of phases in which the high-voltage battery will be charged.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.isoSessionId.description: The Field contains the value of the ISO 15118 sessionID according ASCII.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Total mains energy supplied to the vehicle (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the total energy supplied using charging cables.

This value indicates the maximum charging current for the most recent charging process in ampere (A) (only when charging with alternating current). Values between 0 and 25 are possible. Both the vehicle and charging station could be individually charged with a certain maximum charging current. The value displayed here is the greater of these two figures.

This value indicates the charging voltage for the most recent charging process (only when charging with alternating current). This value is usually in the region of 230 V. However, charging voltages may range from 0 to 300.

This value describes whether the vehicle was charged with direct current (DC) or alternating current (AC) and which charging plug was used for this purpose. The indicated technical value AC_TYPE1PLUG, for example, indicates that the high-voltage battery was charged in alternating current mode, making use of a charging plug of Type 1.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.lockedStatus.description: This signal indicates whether the charging plug is locked, unlocked, an error is send or no aciton is performed. When using this value, also see Vehicle.Body.ChargingPort.PlugStatus.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Plug & Charge (Automatic Payment of Charging Services) authorization status of a charging session. "AUTHORIZATION_SUCCESSFUL" - Authentication with PlugAndCharge successful, "TRANSPORT_LAYER_ERROR" - TLS connection to EVSE not possible, "HIGH_LEVEL_COMMUNICATION_ERROR" - High Level communication with ISO15118 error, "CONTRACT_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR" - EVSE doesn't support Authentication via PlugAndCharge, "AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT" - Authorization run in an error, "AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT" - authentication not finished after 120s, "NVM_READ_CERTIFICATE_ERROR" - Certificates couldn't be red from Charging Control Unit storrage, "CERTIFICATE_UPDATE_ERROR" - update of contract via powerline failed, "XML_SECURITY_ERROR" - Schema validation error of transfered data.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: AUTHORIZATION_SUCCESSFUL, TRANSPORT_LAYER_ERROR, HIGH_LEVEL_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, CONTRACT_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, AUTHORIZATION_ERROR, AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT, NVM_READ_CERTIFICATE_ERROR, CERTIFICATE_UPDATE_ERROR, XML_SECURITY_ERROR

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear middle flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear middle flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.trip.segment.end.drivetrain.batt.description: This value indicates the charging status of the high-voltage battery at the end of the most recently logged drive (in percentage).

vehicle.trip.segment.end.time.description: The time stamp contains the date and local time of the most recently logged and transmitted drive, for example 15.05.2017 15:51:00 UTC or 05/15/2017 15:51:00 UTC.
vehicle.trip.segment.end.time.typical_value_range: dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm:ss UTC or mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss UTC

vehicle.vehicle.avgAuxPower.cardata_element: Auxiliary user power (power consumption of electrical components)
vehicle.vehicle.avgAuxPower.description: This value indicates the power of the auxiliary users in kW at the time of data collection. This is the on-board power consumption including the power for the air conditioning.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Response of ac restriction.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front middle flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front middle flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Indicates a pre-defined time window in which the high-voltage battery of the vehicle should be charged. The value could be either NOTCHOSEN or CHOSEN.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.acceler.description: This value indicates the number of stars which the driving style analysis has given to the acceleration behaviour of the driver at the time of data collection. The system allocates 0 to 5 stars.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.chassis.description: This value indicates the number of stars which the driving style analysis has given to the 'pro-active driving' behaviour of the driver at the time of data collection. The system allocates 0 to 5 stars.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.cardata_element: Activation period for ECO PLUS mode during most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: Indicates the length of time for which ECO PLUS mode was activated during the most recent drive when data were recorded. The values range from 0 to 100.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.cardata_element: Activation period for ECO mode during most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: Indicates the length of time for which ECO mode was activated during the most recent drive when data were recorded. The values range from 0 to 100.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.cardata_element: Energy recuperated during the last drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This value indicates the average electrical energy in kilowatt hours (kWh/100 km or kWh/62 mi) recuperated during the last logged drive per 100 kilometres or 62 miles. The values range from 0 to 254.
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.typical_value_range: 0 kWh/100 km to 170 kWh/100 km or 0 kWh/62 mi to 170 kWh/62 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.cardata_element: Remaining electric range in km or mi
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.description: This value indicates the remaining electric range at the time of data collection.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.typical_value_range: 0 km to 4000 km or 0 mi to 2485 mi, INVALID

vehicle.drivetrain.avgElectricRangeConsu.description: This value indicates the average electric consumption in [kWh/100 km or mi/kWh] at the time of data collection. Note: Not available for the models i3 and i8.
vehicle.drivetrain.avgElectricRangeConsu.typical_value_range: 0 kWh/100 km to 100 kWh/100 km or 0,6213 mi/kWh to 62,1371 mi/kWh

vehicle.vehicle.avgSpeed.description: The value indicates the average speed driven by the vehicle in km/h or mph at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.avgSpeed.typical_value_range: 0 km/h to 300 km/h or 0 mph to 186 mph, INVALID

vehicle.body.flap.isLocked.description: This value indicates whether the charging flap is locked at the time of data collection.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Charging process of the high-voltage battery (inductive/conductive)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the charging process (CONDUCTIVE/INDUCTIVE) used to charge the vehicle at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.chargingDura.description: This value indicates whether the charging time is displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.departureTim.description: This value indicates whether the departure time is displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates the maximum available charging current, independently of the infrastructure and selected cable.
This value indicates the minimum available charging current, independently of the infrastructure and selected cable.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.target.cardata_element: Remaining electric range, depending on target charging status
vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.target.description: This value indicates the remaining electric range at the time of data collection. This depends on the set target value of the charging status.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Reason for ending a charging process
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the reason why a charging process was ended.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: UNKNOWN, CHARGING_GOAL_REACHED, END_REQUESTED_BY_DRIVER, CONNECTOR_REMOVED, POWERGRID_FAILED, HV_SYSTEM_FAILURE, CHARGING_STATION_FAILURE, PARKING_LOCK_FAILED, NO_PARKING_LOCK, SIGNAL_INVALID, INVALID

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Calculated remaining charging time of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the calculated time (in minutes) until the high-voltage battery is fully charged. If a navigation destination has been set, the time remaining until reaching the destination will be displayed.
This value indicates whether the “instant charging” function is activated.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Energy required until high-voltage battery fully charged
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the amount of energy required to fully charge the battery.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.cardata_element: Target charging status of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: This value indicates the target charging status of the high-voltage battery in percent. This is displayed in 10% increments.

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.max.cardata_element: Energy content of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.max.description: This value indicates the current energy content of the high-voltage battery.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.isHospitalityA.cardata_element: Locking status of charging plug after charging complete
vehicle.body.chargingPort.isHospitalityA.description: This value indicates whether the charging plug is automatically unlocked (HOSPITALITY_ACTIVE) or remains locked (HOSPITALITY_INACTIVE) after charging is completed.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the current predicted charging status in percent.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.remain.cardata_element: Estimate of electric range during charging
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.remain.description: This value indicates the electric range predicted during charging.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the estimated remaining charging time in minutes.

vehicle.drivetrain.totalRemainingRange.cardata_element: Estimate of total range during charging
vehicle.drivetrain.totalRemainingRange.description: This value indicates the total range predicted during charging (total of electric range and combustion engine range).

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the current charging status of the vehicle at the time of data collection. For example, NOCHARGING means that the vehicle's high-voltage battery is currently not being charged. INITIALIZATION means that the charging process is just being prepared, while CHARGINGACTIVE means that the battery is just being charged. Other possible values are: CHARGINGPAUSED (charging paused), CHARGINGENDED (charging ended) and CHARGINGERROR (charging error).

vehicle.body.chargingPort.status.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was connected to a charging plug at the time of data collection (CONNECTED) or not (DISCONNECTED).

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: The value shows a list of the vehicle's currently stored location-based charging settings, which were recorded as part of the “Location-based charging settings” service.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.typical_value_range: Details can be found in the corresponding Swagger documentation: ../locationBasedChargingSettings

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.biDi.description: Contains the information about the current availability of the BPT (Bidirectional power transfer) function.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.biDi.typical_value_range: AVAILABLE, NOT_AVAILABLE, DISABLED_MALIBU, DISABLED_HVS, BPT_AND_IMO_DISABLED, BPT_ONLY_FOR_EMERGENCY_POWER_SUPPLY, DISABLED_IMO_POSSIBLE, DISABLED_LONG_TERM

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: Indicator if the battery care persisted mode is active.
Charging to departure time starts as late as possible, to reduce the time where the car has a high SoE (State of Energy).
Active direct Current Charging mode (performance vs. efficient).

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.cardata_element: Health status of the high-voltage battery (SOCE)
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: This value indicates the health status of the high-voltage battery (SOCE, State of Certified Energy).

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery48V.stat.description: SoH (State of Health) of the 48V Battery that is shown to the customer. Created to fulfill EU Battery Regulation.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: OBFCM* reference distance for measuring the supplied mains energy
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the reference distance for measuring the energy supplied using charging cables.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This field indicates the status of authentication with the charging station.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.typical_value_range: NOT_STARTED, STARTED_EIM, STARTED_PNC, STARTED_PLC_EIM, DONE_EIM, DONE_PLC_EIM, DONE_PNC, FAILED_PLC_EIM, FAILED_PNC, UNKNOWN

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Current charging mode.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front middle flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front middle charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear middle flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear middle charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear right flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear right flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.cardata_element: Electrically driven distance during the most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This value indicates the distance covered with electrical energy during the most recent drive in percentage.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: Reduce the target SoE (State of Energy) to a defined value, so that the battery doesn't reach high SoEs thus reducing battery aging.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Current condition of charging plug across all types (inductive, conductive), modes (AC, DC) and service packs.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front left flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front left flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front middle plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front middle charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear right flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear right charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Total mains energy consumed while the combustion engine was active
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the total energy supplied using charging cables while the combustion engine was active (used e.g. by OBFCM*).

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.cardata_element: Electrical energy consumption in COMFORT mode during the most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This indicates the electrical energy consumption (kWh) in COMFORT mode, measured at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: The voltage reached during intialization cable check.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Reference distance for measuring the supplied mains energy while the combustion engine was active
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the reference distance for measuring the energy supplied using charging cables while the combustion engine was active (used e.g. by OBFCM*).
This parameter contains the information that customer selected charging mode is overwritten due to system reasons.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front right flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front right flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front right flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front right charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Total mains energy consumed while the combustion engine was inactive
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the total energy supplied using charging cables while the combustion engine was inactive (used e.g. by OBFCM*).
Result of the last charging process.
Allowing discharging in professional mode for the bidirectional power transfer function (BPT) is selected from customer or not (ON/OFF).

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Current state of button for manual battery preconditioning. Either for charging or driving.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front right plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front right charging port.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.cardata_element: Reference distance for measuring the supplied mains energy while the combustion engine was inactive
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the reference distance for measuring the energy supplied using charging cables while the combustion engine was inactive (used e.g. by OBFCM*).

vehicle.body.chargingPort.plugEventId.description: Unique identifier which increases each time the customer plugs in his electrified vehicle (EXCEPT if the time between unplug and plug-in is less than 90 seconds). This value should be unique for each charging session. See ElectricEngine.Charging.PlugStatus.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This parameter contains the information of deviation to the customer selected charging mode due to system reasons.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: NO_DEVIATION, DC_DYNAMIC_MALIBU, DC_DYNAMIC_MIN_SOE_PROTECTION, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_EVSE, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING_WAKE_UP_LIMIT_REACHED, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING, CHARGING_TIMESLOT, CHARGING_IN_TIMESLOT, SMART_CHARGING, DC_DYNAMIC, BIDIRECTIONAL_CHARGING, NO_ACTION, UNKNOWN

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: Contains the target state of charge that shall be used as target in professional mode. At least this target state of charge will be reached by departure time.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Current state of toggle switch for automatic battery preconditioning. ON means automatic mode (navigation based) of the predictive thermal management (vWM) is activated. OFF means automatic mode (navigation based) of the predictive thermal management (vWM) is deactivated. TEMP_OFF stands for temporary deactivation for current trip of the automatic predictive thermal management.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear left flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear left flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear middle plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear middle charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear right plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear right charging port.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.statusClearTex.description: Required alongside Vehicle.Body.ChargingPort.Status to ensure correct handling of charging sessions for G08 BEV vehicles (for details, contact DE-3-E; onboard fix expected by 2021-03)

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging preference of current charging profile. This value depends on charge mode selection. For Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Mode being "DELAYED_CHARGING", Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Preference is either "SMART_CHARGING" or "CHARGING_WINDOW". In case Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Mode is "IMMEDIATE_CHARGING", Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Preference is set to "NO_PRESELECTION".
Information if the upcoming departure time is relevant for the professional mode (bidirectional/unidirectional) and the target state of energy shall be reached at this time.
Reason for the end of charging, from SP25 on.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: NO_CHARGING_END_SINCE_IPF_WAKEUP, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_HMI_UNPLUG_CABLE_ONCE, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_HMI_CHARGING_TARGET_REACHED, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_APP_UNPLUG_CABLE_ONCE, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_APP_CHARGING_TARGET_REACHED, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_CHARGING_STOP_BUTTON_SOCKET, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_KEY, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_WALLBOX, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_LATCH, HV_BATTERY_FULLY_CHARGED, INFRASTRUCTURE_PHYSICAL_LIMITS_REACHED_TARGET_SOE_NOT_REACHABLE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_EVSE_SHUTDOWN, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_GBT_CST_MESSAGE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_STATIC_PILOT, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_COMMUNICATION_ERROR_FAILED_RESPONSE_CODE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, INFRASTRUCTURE_NO_ENERGY_TRANSFER, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_PRECHARGE_ERROR, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_EVSE_MALFUNCTION_EMERGENCY_SHUTDOWN, INFRASTRUCTURE_STATION_NOT_COMPATIBLE, INFRASTRUCTURE_CHARGE_READINESS_TIMEOUT, INFRASTRUCTURE_AC_MAXIMUM_GRID_ERROR_REACHED, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_GBT_ISOLATION_ERROR_DETECTED, INFRASTRUCTURE_AUTHENTIFICATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_DCDC_ERROR, VEHICLE_PLC_BOOTUP_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_MAXIMAL_CURRENT_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_ISOLATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_MAXIMUM_TEMPERATURE_CHARGING_SOCKET_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_LT3_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_FUSI_CABLE_LOCK_ERROR, VEHICLE_PLC_COMMUNICATION_NOT_POSSIBLE, FLEXCHARGER_GRID_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_GRID_TEMPERATURE_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_EVSE_TEMPERATURE_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_EVSE_INTERNAL_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_AC_DC_FAULT_CURRENT, FLEXCHARGER_INCORRECT_REACTION_TIME_PWM, FLEXCHARGER_CHARGING_CURRENT_TOO_HIGH, FLEXCHARGER_PE_FAULT, INFRASTRUCTURE_INEFFICIENT_CHARGING_LOW_POWER, VEHICLE_CABLE_LOCKING_ERROR, VEHICLE_CONFIGURATION_ERROR_400V_800V, INFRASTRUCTURE_NO_AC_VOLTAGE, PLUG_AND_CHARGE_TLS_ERROR, PLUG_AND_CHARGE_CONTRACT_ERROR, SMART_CHARGING_TARIFF_SELECTION_INVALID, SMART_CHARGING_CHARGING_PROFILE_INVALID, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_APP, CHARGING_PAUSED, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_VOLTAGE_TOO_HIGH, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_SOE_TOO_LOW, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INTERNAL_ERROR, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INCOMPATIBLE_ADAPTER, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INCOMPATIBLE_CONSUMER

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Indicates the charging status in cases where e-route charging is used by the customer for his journey. E-route charging sessions have two distinct phases. Route optimzed charging sessions override the customer target state of charge temporarily.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: Min target state of charge requested by customer for smart charging and V2X.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port any position flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port any position plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front left flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front left charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port front left plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front left charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear left flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear left charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging HV Status.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: INVALID, CHARGING, ERROR, NOT_CHARGING, WAITING_FOR_CHARGING, FINISHED_FULLY_CHARGED, FINISHED_NOT_FULL

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Reason of the last charging process.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.typical_value_range: CHARGING_GOAL_REACHED, END_REQUESTED_BY_DRIVER, CONNECTOR_REMOVED, POWERGRID_FAILED, HV_SYSTEM_FAILURE, CHARGING_STATION_FAILURE, PARKING_LOCK_FAILED, NO_PARKING_LOCK, INVALID, -NA-

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging profile timer type (e.g., Weekdays or TwoTimesTimer)

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: The current charging power in Watt. This value should only be considered with respect to the current timestamp.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port rear left plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear left charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.cardata_element: Battery charging port any position flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Climatization Activation of Vehicle in Charging Profile, vehicle interior gets preconditioned for next departure time.

Vehicles with a complete RCP (Remote Charging Profile) Configuration explicitly send values for all charging profile attributes. For Vehicles without a complete RCP Configuration, some defaults are applied.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Status of battery preconditioning activity. On legacy value only valid for legacy-project SP2021plus.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.typical_value_range: OFF, ON_LEGACY, MANUAL_ON_CHARGE, AUTOMATIC_ON, REMOTE_ON_CHARGE, REMOTE_ON_DRIVE, REMOTE_OFF, UNKNOWN

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.description: Timer State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer to the vehicle).
Hour setting of climate timer as per vehicle-configured timezone.
Minute setting of climate timer as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Timer 1 State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer 1 to the vehicle).
Hour setting of climate timer 1 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.displa.description: Indicates if and how the electric range shall be displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Minute setting of climate timer 1 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.hmi.distanceU.description: Distance unit used in the current HMI

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: GPS fix status. "NO_FIX" means when less than 3 satellites are found. "2D_GPS_FIX" is obtained when at least 3 satellites are found. "3D_GPS_FIX" is obtained when at least 4 satellites are found.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Timer 2 State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer 2 to the vehicle).
Hour setting of climate timer 2 as per vehicle-configured timezone.
Minute setting of climate timer 2 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: Number of GPS satellites used for positioning and relates to the reliability of the positioning.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.cardata_element: Tire temperature in Celsius, front left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the front left.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.cardata_element: Tire temperature in Celsius, front right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the front right.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.cardata_element: Tire temperature in Celsius, rear left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the rear left.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.cardata_element: Tire temperature in Celsius, rear right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the rear right.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the front right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the front left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the front right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the rear left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the rear right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the rear left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the rear right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the front left in kPa

vehicle.vehicleIdentification.connectedD.description: This value provides an overview of all active ConnectedDrive contracts and the end of the respective contract period.
